translations: 1. 赠予，授予：将某物或某种荣誉、权力等给予某人。
· The award was bestowed upon her for her outstanding achievements.
这个奖项是因为她的杰出成就而授予她的。
2. 安置，安顿：将某人或某物放置在某个地方。
· He bestowed the books on the top shelf.
他把书放在了顶层的书架上。

sentences.sentence: It was a title bestowed upon him by the king.
sentences.translation: 那是国王赐给他的头衔。

sentences.sentence: He considered himself unworthy of the honour they had bestowed on him.
sentences.translation: 他认为自己不配得到大家赋予他的荣誉。

sentences.sentence: I feel unworthy of the precious gift you have bestowed on me.
